name: Martin Gin (Cleo)
occupation: Criminal courier and fixer (alias: Ghost Hand)
appearance: A cautious-looking man with an unremarkable face, deliberately dressing in plain, practical clothing to avoid attention. His movements are controlled and alert, giving the impression of someone used to watching exits and escape routes.
personality: Calculating, opportunistic, and highly pragmatic. Martin is patient and careful, preferring indirect methods and aliases to direct confrontation. He is loyal only as long as cooperation benefits his own survival and profit.
background: Martin Gin, also known as 'Ghost Hand,' is the third hacker in Cassandra and the murderer of both the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case and the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case. He deliberately attracted Patrizio von Samsa's attention and was employed by him under the alias 'Ghost Hand' to handle computer security. Acting as a courier and intermediary, Martin transported goods to the docks and handled sensitive deliveries. Through his work, he assisted Patrizio in seizing the missing businessmen's bank assets in Cassandra. Martin operates under false names and avoids revealing his true identity. He is actually Martin Cleo, son of Sanchez Cleo, and has a vendetta against Ben Cleo, believing Ben was responsible for his father's disappearance.
goals: Complete assignments efficiently to secure payment and protection
Remain hidden and avoid becoming a disposable pawn
secrets: He operates under the alias 'Ghost Hand' and conceals his true identity
He knowingly assisted Patrizio in acquiring the missing businessmen's assets
He is the murderer of the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case (the unknown 19-year-old Black girl found in cold storage)
He is the murderer of the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case (Jenny Florence/Lucifero)
He killed Lucifero because he mistakenly identified her as the hacker who stole Patrizio's secrets, and because she intercepted the Borrachero package
He has a scar on his face that he deliberately inflicted to avoid being recognized by Ben Cleo
He can sense Cassandra calling to him, but doesn't realize this is Nyogtha's call to its chosen ones
He placed the hallucinogenic drug in Marcel's drink, suspecting Marcel saw him emerging from the sewer
He went into the sewer to find Lucifero's hideout and retrieve the intercepted Borrachero
He gave the folding knife (which belonged to Philip) to Lux to plant on Lucifero's body to confuse the investigation

properties.note: Conceals his true identity as Martin Cleo.
Related to his work as Ghost Hand.

properties.clue: Used to kill Lucifero in the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case. Same caliber as Ben Cleo's gold-plated Desert Eagle, but Martin's is not the same gun.

notes: Martin Gin (Ghost Hand) is the murderer of both murder cases: 1) 2002 Paradil Hotel case - killed the unknown 19-year-old Black girl found in cold storage; 2) 2003 Reindeer Bar case - killed Jenny Florence (Lucifero) with a .357 caliber bullet to the heart. He is actually Martin Cleo, son of Sanchez Cleo, and has a vendetta against Ben Cleo. He deliberately scarred his face to avoid recognition. He works for Patrizio as a hacker and courier. He is being called by Nyogtha and will eventually become one of its chosen ones. He is a shadowy logistical NPC who can reveal connections between criminal operations, financial manipulation, and Patrizio's larger schemes if pressured or exposed.
